Command Line Interface Manual

Installation

cd cli;
sh ./install.sh

First steps

Just run : 

cpm

Some built in documentation exists within the command interface (available commands and description). Every command/subcommand have a â€“help documentation (some are empty).

Module Management

- Reload the module definitions : (if modifications have been made on .module files) 

cpm reload

- List all available modules 

cpm module ls

- Run the module MODULE_NAME with optional (but often required) configuration file CONF_FILE (hosted on server) 

cpm run MODULE_NAME [CONF_FILE]

returns a <process id>

Run Management

cpm process ls [-a]
